title: Diamond Cascade: Contemporary Grand Haaram with Gemstone Accents
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut Diamonds of VS clarity and G color. Features a central Ruby and Emerald
both of exceptional quality. Finished with lustrous
features: This contemporary Haaram features an intricate floral design, handcrafted with delicate openwork detailing. The design incorporates traditional South Indian floral motifs with a modern, lightweight feel. The central pendant features a Ruby and Emerald, symbols of prosperity and growth respectively. Delicate pearl drops add a touch of elegance. The chain has a braided rope style.
colors: and the soft luster of Pearls.
occasions: and grand celebrations like Seemantham or upscale parties. A statement piece that elevates any outfit
suitable for both traditional and modern attire.
description: A stunning blend of tradition and contemporary design, this Haaram offers unparalleled elegance and sparkle. The exceptional craftsmanship ensures both beauty and durability. The auspicious combination of ruby and emerald adds cultural significance. A cherished heirloom piece that will be treasured for generations.
